bibl.seg: HANDLEY E.W., H.G. IOANNIDOU, P.J. PARSONS and J.E.G. WHITEHORNE, with contributions by H. MAEHLER, M. MAEHLER, M.L. WEST, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LIX (Nos 3963-4008). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 79.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1992, 8Â°, xii-213 pp. et VIII pll. ISBN 0-85698-116-8.
P. Oxy. LIX, 3963-4008. - I. New Poetic Texts (3963-3965). - II. Comedy (3966-3972). - III. Documents of the Roman and Byzantine Periods (3973-3987). - IV. Private Letters (3988-4008).
